meta.title: Vet Record – Pet Health Tracking App for Dogs & Cats
meta.description: Track vaccinations, medications, vet visits, and health history for your dog or cat. Cloud sync, reminders, and easy sharing.

hero.subtitle: Track your pet's vaccinations, medical treatments, and more – all in one place. Download the Vet Record app today to ensure your pets receive the care they deserve!
hero.tryFreeDesc: The best application to manage your pet's health worldwide

features.title: Powerful
features.intro: Introducing Vet Record: Your All-In-One Pet Health Management App!
features.introDesc: Are you a dedicated pet owner looking for a smarter way to keep your furry friends healthy and happy? Meet Vet Record - the ultimate pet health management app designed to simplify your life and ensure your pets always receive the best care possible.

cloud.title: Cloud-Based Convenience
cloud.description: Access your pet's information anytime, anywhere, on any device. Stay connected 24/7 with our cloud-based system.
cloud.alt: All pet medical records stored securely in one app

health.title: Comprehensive Health Tracking
health.description: Maintain detailed records of your pet's health: vaccinations, medications, surgeries, and more. Never miss a crucial health milestone again!
health.alt: Vet Record pet medical records screen with health history

reminders.title: Intelligent Reminders
reminders.description: Get notified about vet appointments, medication schedules, and vaccination dates. We'll even remind you about your pet's birthday!
reminders.alt: Vet Record smart reminders for pet vaccinations and medications

sharing.title: Effortless Data Sharing
sharing.description: Share your pet's medical information easily with family, friends, or a new vet. Keep everyone informed for the best care.
sharing.alt: Simple pet care management with Vet Record mobile app

reviews.title: What our
reviews.cta: See all reviews on Google Play

footer.newsletterDesc: Be the first to receive updates
footer.productHunt: Check it out on Product Hunt

about.title: Managing Pet Health Records
about.intro: VET RECORD is dedicated to revolutionizing how pet owners manage their pets' health information, making it easier to track vaccinations, medications, and medical history.

why1.title: User Friendly
why1.description: Intuitive interface designed for easy navigation and quick data entry

why2.title: Comprehensive Tracking
why2.description: Track vaccinations, medications, weight, and all important health records

why3.title: Secure Storage
why3.description: Your pet's health data is securely stored and easily accessible when needed

about.ctaDesc: Download VET RECORD today and take control of your pet's health records

contact.title: Any query?
contact.intro: We're here to help with any questions about the VET RECORD app
contact.newsletterCheck: I agree to receive emails, newsletters and promotional messages

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: VET RECORD ("we," "our," "us," or "the Company") values and protects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application (the "Service").

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.text: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Usage
dataCollection.intro: Our app collects and processes the following types of information:
dataCollection.usage: Usage data (for app improvement and analytics)
dataCollection.device: Device information (for app functionality and security)
dataCollection.petRecords: Pet health records (when you input them)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
dataSecurity.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services:
thirdParty.compliance: All third-party providers are required to protect your data and comply with privacy laws.

updates.title: Updates to Privacy Policy
updates.text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The "Last updated" date at the top of this page will reflect any changes.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.text: We comply with applicable data protection laws, including Google Play's User Data policy and local privacy regulations.

deleteData.title: Data Deletion Request - VET RECORD

option2.title: Option 2: Email Request
option2.intro: If you cannot access the app, email us at
option2.subject: Subject line: "Data Deletion Request - VET RECORD"
option2.startDate: The approximate date you started using the app

retention.title: Retention Period
retention.process: We will process your request within 30 days
retention.legal: Some data may be retained for legal compliance
retention.inactive: Inactive data is automatically deleted after 90 days

deleteData.note: Note: Once your data is deleted, this action cannot be undone. Please make sure you have backed up any important information before proceeding with the deletion request.
